Read the latest changelog No data found‚Ä¶ Search vehicle Search here‚Ä¶ Clear search Join the ThunderDex Discord group Be part of something amazing‚Ä¶ Usage in battles: Wiki The best War Thunder Wikipedia app. Join the ThunderDex Subreddit Click here to join the ThunderDex subreddit!!! üòÅ Features & plans for 2024 2024 ThunderDex Plans Preview upcoming app features test click here Coming soon! ThunderDex was initially conceived in 2023.
I was a frequent user of the War Thunder Wiki and got tired of using it on my browser.
With 10+ years of coding knowledge, I developed this app in a few months and decided to release it to everyone for FREE!

I really hope you enjoy the app! - HiFii
Hello!!

Thank you for using ThunderDex ‚ù§

The BEST and ONLY War Thunder Wikipedia client for Android.

Please, consider donating if you are enjoying the app... a LOT of work goes into this free app.

You can donate by going into the settings of the app and clicking on the PayPal, or the Cash App option!

-HiFii Support the developer on PayPal Support the developer on Cash App! Add extra customization options (vehicle image size, etc)

Filter vehicles by rank instead of alphabetically

Add option to choose how vehicles are filtered

Improvements to the vehicle image viewer

Add an option to download selected vehicle images

Add more translations

Once enough languages are added, create a language chooser option

Even more improvements to loading and performance

Adding more information and user requested information too

Add a wallpaper section with a download ability!! (from the war thunder Wikipedia wallpaper site)
How do I contribute? ThunderDex Contributors Tdikristof_ on Discord (Hungarian translations) Theslimyboi on Discord (Lithuanian translations)

Changelog 3.5.0:
** CLEAR YOUR APP DATA IF YOU HAVE ISSUES **
‚Ä¢ Add filter preferences in the app. It is on the right of the search bar, you can filter alphabetically, ascending rank, and descending rank
‚Ä¢ NEW APP ICON!! :)
‚Ä¢ Clear cache setting moved to the top of the list
‚Ä¢ Settings should now fit on your screen without scrolling
‚Ä¢ Replaced Preview New Activities with About ThunderDex in settings
‚Ä¢ You can now download vehicle images
‚Ä¢ Use similar looking icons for settings
‚Ä¢ fix summary alignment when summary is empty
‚Ä¢ Misc changes, fixes, and improvements
‚Ä¢ Disabled jetifier in gradle.properties

3.3.1:
‚Ä¢ Added Predictive Back Animations in the app
‚Ä¢ Redesigned the Preview App Features Preference
‚Ä¢ Added back navigation to the preview upcoming app features Preference
‚Ä¢ Updated the stars animation time in the preview app features preference
‚Ä¢ Updated Hungarian translations (Thanks tdikristof_ on Discord)
